Fixed screen orientations will be ignored in most cases, starting from Android 16. Android is moving toward a model where apps are expected to adapt to various orientations, display sizes, and aspect ratios.

This library supports using KSP instead of kapt, which greatly improves performance. Learn more: https://developer.android.com/studio/build/migrate-to-ksp

show-url.description: Learn about how to enable KSP and use the KSP processor for this dependency instead

The image `ic_launcher.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: mipmap-hdpi/ic_launcher.png: 128x128 dp (192x192 px), mipmap-mdpi/ic_launcher.png: 192x192 dp (192x192 px), mipmap-xhdpi/ic_launcher.png: 96x96 dp (192x192 px), mipmap-xxhdpi/ic_launcher.png: 64x64 dp (192x192 px), mipmap-xxxhdpi/ic_launcher.png: 48x48 dp (192x192 px)
The `ic_launcher.png` icon has identical contents in the following configuration folders: mipmap-hdpi, mipmap-mdpi, mipmap-xhdpi, mipmap-xxhdpi, mipmap-xxxhdpi
